38 //
39 // OMPL kinematic planner wrapper, templated on the state type and the specific
40 // type of OMPL planner to be used under the hood.
41 //
43

45 #define FASTRACK_PLANNING_OMPL_KINEMATIC_PLANNER_H

60 namespace fastrack {
61 namespace planning {
62 
63 namespace ob = ompl::base;
64 namespace og = ompl::geometric;
65 
66 template<typename P, typename S, typename E, typename B, typename SB>
67 class OmplKinematicPlanner : public KinematicPlanner<S, E, B, SB> {
68 public:
69  ~OmplKinematicPlanner() {}
70  explicit OmplKinematicPlanner()
71  : KinematicPlanner<S, E, B, SB>() {
72  // Set OMPL log level.
73  ompl::msg::setLogLevel(ompl::msg::LogLevel::LOG_ERROR);
74  }
75 
76  // Plan a trajectory from the given start to goal states starting
77  // at the given time.
78  // NOTE! The states in the output trajectory are essentially configurations.
79  Trajectory<S> Plan(const S& start, const S& goal, double start_time=0.0) const;
80 
81 private:
82  // Convert between OMPL states and configurations.
83  S FromOmplState(const ob::State* state) const;
84 }; //\class KinematicPlanner
85 
86 // ---------------------------- IMPLEMENTATION ------------------------------ //
87 
88 // Convert between OMPL states and configurations.
89 template<typename P, typename S, typename E, typename B, typename SB>
90 S OmplKinematicPlanner<P, S, E, B, SB>::FromOmplState(const ob::State* state) const {
91  // Catch null state.
92  if (!state)
93  throw std::runtime_error("OmplKinematicPlanner: null OMPL state.");
94 
95  // Cast state to proper type.
96  const ob::RealVectorStateSpace::StateType* cast_state =
97  static_cast<const ob::RealVectorStateSpace::StateType*>(state);
98 
99  // Populate configuration.
100  VectorXd config(S::ConfigurationDimension());
101  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < S::ConfigurationDimension(); ii++)
102  config(ii) = cast_state->values[ii];
103 
104  return S(config);
105 }
106 
107 // Plan a trajectory from the given start to goal states starting
108 // at the given time.
109 template<typename P, typename S, typename E, typename B, typename SB>
110 Trajectory<S> OmplKinematicPlanner<P, S, E, B, SB>::
111 Plan(const S& start, const S& goal, double start_time) const {
112  // Unpack start and goal configurations.
113  const VectorXd start_config = start.Configuration();
114  const VectorXd goal_config = goal.Configuration();
115 
116  // Check that both start and stop are in bounds.
117  if (!this->env_.AreValid(start.OccupiedPositions(), this->bound_)) {
118  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1.0, "Start point was in collision or out of bounds.");
119  return Trajectory<S>();
120  }
121 
122  if (!this->env_.AreValid(goal.OccupiedPositions(), this->bound_)) {
123  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1.0, "Goal point was in collision or out of bounds.");
124  return Trajectory<S>();
125  }
126 
127  // Create the OMPL state space corresponding to this environment.
128  auto ompl_space(
129  std::make_shared<ob::RealVectorStateSpace>(S::ConfigurationDimension()));
130 
131  // Set bounds for the environment.
132  const VectorXd lower = S::GetConfigurationLower();
133  const VectorXd upper = S::GetConfigurationUpper();
134 
135  ob::RealVectorBounds ompl_bounds(S::ConfigurationDimension());
136  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < S::ConfigurationDimension(); ii++) {
137  ompl_bounds.setLow(ii, lower(ii));
138  ompl_bounds.setHigh(ii, upper(ii));
139  }
140 
141  ompl_space->setBounds(ompl_bounds);
142 
143  // Create a SimpleSetup instance and set the state validity checker function.
144  og::SimpleSetup ompl_setup(ompl_space);
145  ompl_setup.setStateValidityChecker([&](const ob::State* state) {
146  return this->env_.AreValid(FromOmplState(state).OccupiedPositions(), this->bound_);
147  });
148 
149  // Set the start and goal states.
150  ob::ScopedState<ob::RealVectorStateSpace> ompl_start(ompl_space);
151  ob::ScopedState<ob::RealVectorStateSpace> ompl_goal(ompl_space);
152  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < S::ConfigurationDimension(); ii++) {
153  ompl_start[ii] = start_config(ii);
154  ompl_goal[ii] = goal_config(ii);
155  }
156 
157  ompl_setup.setStartAndGoalStates(ompl_start, ompl_goal);
158 
159  // Set the planner.
160  ob::PlannerPtr ompl_planner(new P(ompl_setup.getSpaceInformation()));
161  ompl_setup.setPlanner(ompl_planner);
162 
163  // Solve. Parameter is the amount of time (in seconds) used by the solver.
164  const ob::PlannerStatus solved = ompl_setup.solve(this->max_runtime_);
165 
166  if (!solved) {
167  ROS_WARN("OMPL Planner could not compute a solution.");
168  return Trajectory<S>();
169  }
170 
171  // Unpack the solution and assign timestamps.
172  const og::PathGeometric& solution = ompl_setup.getSolutionPath();
173 
174  // Populate the Trajectory with states and time stamps.
175  // NOTE! These states are essentially just configurations.
176  std::vector<S> states;
177  std::vector<double> times;
178 
179  double time = start_time;
180  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < solution.getStateCount(); ii++) {
181  const S state = FromOmplState(solution.getState(ii));
182 
183  // Increment time by the duration it takes us to get from the previous
184  // configuration to this one.
185  if (ii > 0)
186  time += this->dynamics_.BestPossibleTime(states.back(), state);
187 
188  times.push_back(time);
189  states.push_back(state);
190  }
191 
192  return Trajectory<S>(states, times);
193 }
194 
195 } //\namespace planning
196 } //\namespace fastrack
197

S FromOmplState(const ob::State *state) const
